mapper.update: update sellingitems_tbl set item_title=#{item_title}, madein=#{nation}, item_spec=#{item_spec}, price=#{price} where item_code=#{item_code}
mapper.select: select item_code, item_title, price, madein "nation", regdate "reg_date" from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select item_code, item_title, price, madein, to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regdate from sellingitems_tbl) a ) where rn > #{start} and rn < #{end}
select item_code from sellingitems_tbl where item_code = #{code}
